title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Multidimensional Domain-Interactive Cognitive Process Integration Development and Application Project

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can develop cognitive strategies that integrate three or more subdomains of mathematics (geometry, algebra, statistics).
Learners can design optimal solutions through problem structure analysis in complex contexts (theory-experiment-field cases).
Learners can build a hierarchical thinking system through sequential learning from simple to complex problems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
